function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Retailers not using digital signs to present COVID information","Impact":"Lack of access to important health information for customers","Mitigation":"Encourage and support retailers to use digital signs for COVID information","Technologies":"Digital signage systems","People":"Customers, general public","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Fragility of paper signs reflecting uncertainty during pandemic","Impact":"Emotional and psychological impact on people","Mitigation":"Provide additional support and resources for emotional well-being during crises","Technologies":"Digital signage, mental health support services","People":"General public","Owner":"Government agencies, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Retailers not demonstrating corporate social responsibility through signage","Impact":"Negative impact on brand image and customer perception","Mitigation":"Create guidelines and incentives for retailers to demonstrate corporate social responsibility through signage","Technologies":"Marketing and branding strategies","People":"Customers, general public","Owner":"Retail industry associations, government agencies"}]}
